post.text: The State Department's quid pro quo scheme proves how CORRUPT our system is. Attempting to protect Crooked Hillary, NOT our American service members or national security information, is absolutely DISGRACEFUL. The American people deserve so much better. On November 8th, we will END this RIGGED system once and for all!

comment.author: Leah
comment.text: Anything can be manipulated. Anything. What we need is a restoration of integrity and without a fear of God, we won't see changes in integrity. You can do many things, Mr. Trump, but you cannot make people good. Not even Jesus could do that except by the person's own choice.

replies.author: Leah
replies.text: Absolutely, correct. The only way we can overcome a fraudulent election is to outnumber with our votes that are legitimate. NO ONE should stay home and not vote. Volunteer to take people who the early voting polls in the next couple of weeks.
